night.text: Cloudy with some clear spells. Rain and fog in many places. Mainly westerly wind 3-9, on coast in gusts up to 12 m/s. Air temperature 4..9°C.
night.sea:
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 13:00 UTC Nov 6 to 13:00 UTC Nov 7, 2023.
Weather summary: weak area of Low is over Baltic Sea.
No warnings
Northern Baltic: mainly southerly, in the evening variable 2-7 m/s, at night in northern waters mainly northerly, in southern waters southwest, west 3-9, in southern waters in gusts up to 12 m/s. Rain in many places. Visibility from moderate to good.
Western Gulf of Finland: variable, in evening becoming westerly 2-7 m/s, at night westerly 3-9 m/s, tomorrow evening in gusts up to 12 m/s. Rain in many places. Visibility moderate to good.
Eastern Gulf of Finland: southeast, east 4-10, in gusts up to 13 m/s, in evening decreasing and before midnight variable 2-7 m/s, after midnight westerly 3-8, in gusts up to 11 m/s. Today in many places, at night and tomorrow by day locally rain. Visibility from moderate to good.
Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: variable 2-6 m/s, in the evening veering to southwest, west, at night westerly, tomorrow by day mainly southwest 3-9, in gusts to 12 m/s. Rain in many places, in the evening and at night locally fog possible. Visibility from moderate to poor.
night.peipsi: Southwest, west wind 3-8 m/s. Wave height up to 0.6 m. At times rain, possible fog. Visibility moderate or poor. Air temperature 4..7°C.

day.text: Cloudy with some clear spells. Rain in many places. In the forenoon locally fog. Southwest, west wind 3-9, in gusts up to 12 m/s. Air temperature 6..10°C.
day.peipsi: Mainly southwest wind 3-8 m/s. Wave height up to 0.6 m. At times rain. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 5..7°C.

night.text: Cloudy with some clear spells. Rain at times. Locally fog. Southwest, west wind 2-8 m/s. Air temperature 3..8°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain in many places, more tensiv in southern part and in islands. Southwest, west wind 3-9, around Gulf of Riga in gusts to 12 m/s, by evening decreasing. Air temperature 6..9°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain in many places. Mainly southerly wind 2-8 m/s. Air temperature 1..7°C.

day.text: Overcast. At times rain. Southwest, south 3-9, in the afternoon increasing around Gulf of Riga in gusts up to 14 m/s. Air temperature 5..9°C.

night.text: Cloudy. Rain in many places, by morning possibility for rain is decreasing. Wind around south 2-8 m/s. Air temperature 1..7°C.

day.text: Cloudy. At times rain. South, southeast wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature 5..8°C.
